metatags.og:description: United States Capitol Madam Speaker, Madam Vice President, our First Lady and Second Gentleman. Members of Congress and the Cabinet. Justices of the Supreme Court. My fellow Americans.   Last year COVID-19 kept us apart. This year we are finally together again.  Tonight, we meet as Democrats Republicans and Independents. But most importantly as Americans.  With a duty to one…

metatags.og:description: Olga Lopatkina paced around her basement in circles like a trapped animal. For more than a week, the Ukrainian mother had heard nothing from her six adopted children stranded in Mariupol , and she was going out of her mind with worry.

metatags.og:title: Think Tank reports on the invasion of Ukraine
metatags.og:description: Reflections on what might or should become the outcome of the war; how Ukraine’s recovery depends on security guarantees; satellite imagery analysis capturing flood threat after the dam’s destruction; the resilience and trauma of Ukraine’s civil society; how bad Ukraine’s humanitarian crisis a year later is; tackling the constraints on EU Foreign Policy towards Ukraine; Europe’s geopolitical awakening as well as its implications for European security; and Ukraine’s accession to the EU requiring a change in Europe itself are some of the topics discussed in the present update.
metatags.umbraco_title: Think Tank reports on the invasion of Ukraine

metatags.twitter:title: ‘Something Was Badly Wrong’: When Washington Realized Russia Was Actually Invading Ukraine
metatags.og:title: ‘Something Was Badly Wrong’: When Washington Realized Russia Was Actually Invading Ukraine
metatags.og:description: A first-ever oral history of how top U.S. and Western officials saw the warning signs of a European land war, their frantic attempts to stop it — and the moment Putin actually crossed the border.
metatags.twitter:creator: @politico
